findings.title: Ownership has not been renounced
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to update fees, exclude and include accounts from transfer fees and reward distribution, and blacklist any address at any time.

findings.title: Unrestricted Fee Update by Owner
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to update fees to any percentage at any time without restrictions.

findings.title: The owner of the contract can exclude and include accounts from transfer fees and reward distribution
findings.description: The owner has the ability to manipulate account inclusion and exclusion from transfer fees and reward distribution, potentially leading to unfair treatment or exploitation.

findings.title: Centralized Blacklisting
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to blacklist any address at any time, which can lead to censorship and unfair treatment of certain users.

findings.title: _getCurrentSupply Function OUT_OF_GAS Exception
findings.description: The _getCurrentSupply function uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is long.
